thread.title: Andersen Corporation Acquires Heritage Windows and Doors Expanding Luxury Portfolio West

author: cnbc.com
title: Andersen Corporation Acquires Heritage Windows and Doors Expanding Luxury Portfolio West
text:
BAYPORT, Minn., March 5, 2018 /PRNewswire/ -- Andersen Corporation announced today the acquisition of Heritage Windows and Doors, a manufacturer of custom, high-quality aluminum windows and doors in Gilbert, Arizona. Heritage specializes in serving the luxury residential and commercial market creating high performance aluminum windows and doors that are resistant to the desert's natural forces.
"The acquisition of Heritage expands Andersen's product portfolio, increases our advanced manufacturing capabilities and extends our geographic reach," said Jay Lund, Andersen Chairman and CEO. "We welcome all Heritage employees into the Andersen family and look forward to a bright future together."
The Heritage® brand, a well-respected and highly-regarded brand by discerning architects and builders, will complement Andersen's Architectural Collection. The Heritage product line of high performance doors includes sliding glass doors, multi-sliding doors, French doors, bi-folding doors and glass only stack and slide doors. Heritage's window product offering includes architectural style, casement awning, horizontal slider and single hung. Heritage is known for its thermal break system of windows and doors which provides high energy performance in the southwest region serving Arizona, California, Colorado, New Mexico, Nevada, Texas, Utah and Sonora, Mexico.
The owner of Heritage Windows & Doors is Tashco Industries, Inc., a private company founded in 1979. Financial terms of the transaction are not being disclosed.
About Andersen Corporation
Headquartered in Bayport, Minnesota, Andersen Corporation and its subsidiaries manufacture and market window and door products under the Andersen ® , Renewal by Andersen ® , Silver Line ® , American Craftsman ® , EMCO ® , Weiland® and MQ™ brands. Andersen is an international enterprise employing more than 12,000 people in North America and Europe. Andersen was founded in 1903 and is a privately held company.
